name: Kielans Vehicle Sim
description:
This vehicle simulation game was created from scratch for my University final year project. There are free game modes, a track mode, an open world mode and mini game modes. Track mode consists of two tracks, Open world mode has one map and the mini game mode has one mini game.

Future Work:

I am currently building my own game engine based on everything I learnt from created this game. Eventually I will recreate this game in my engine with lots of improvements for the mechanics, gameplay and the visuals.
